lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You are at your first rock concert with friends.
Midway through the concert, someone passes you a joint and tells you it's O.K. to take some.
After you smoke a little, he offers to get you high (choose CONTINUE to get high).
You smoke whatever he has at the concert and get a tremendous high from it. Your activities are undetected by parents and/or authorities.
You are busted by the police on the way out of the concert and are taken to the police station, where they call your parents to come pick you up. Familial sphere and Trustworthiness decrease.
